reviewText:
This "DVD" does not play on a DVD player.  My top-of-the-line Sony DVD player (in 1998) says to "insert disc" when this DVD is in.  Perhaps it's a "burned" disc and not a "pressed" disc.

  I had very high hopes in seeing this film once again as I had seen it on PBS when it was originally released.  It was, to me, a very interesting film and this DVD has left me disappointed.  -  Thursday  26 August 2010.
